actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to make small business procurement policies and procedures as prescribed in the Small Business Act applicable to the U.S. Postal Service.

summary.text: Makes small business procurement policies and procedures as prescribed in the Small Business Act applicable to the United States Postal Service. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 410(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to make small business procurement policies and procedures as prescribed in the Small Business Act applicable to the U.S. Postal Service.
